mapper.sql: id, `name`, code, name_in_jd AS nameInJd, code_in_jd AS codeInJd, name_in_youzan AS nameInYouzan, code_in_youzan AS codeInYouzan, name_in_pdd AS nameInPdd, code_in_pdd AS codeInPdd, name_in_taobao AS nameInTaobao, code_in_taobao AS codeInTaobao, is_del AS isDel, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, creator, modifier
